title: Electronic Assembly Technician
full_description: ROSEN is a leading privately owned company that was established in 1981. ROSEN is an extended team of people with a passion for technology and innovation. We are always looking for young professionals as well as experienced employees.Our ongoing organic growth results in career opportunities and gives our employees chances for further development and
